website_summaries.verdict: A good model if you are looking for similar power to a KitchenAid but at a lower price point.
pros: Quiet, powerful (500 watts), and comes with lots of attachments, including the ever-popular dough hook and whip
cons: Some users wish the head would lift further up for ease of adding ingredients

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I bought kitchenaid artisan for 3.5 qt and returned it as we thought this is small. We bought kitchen aid classic for 5 qt. and returned it as it was bigger. I came across this piece and thought to try and we love it. It is cheaper and give you all the functionality what kitchenaid offer. So let's Beat the hype of Kitchenaid stand mixer and price. I am Indian (Asian) and we use it daily for our Roti(chapati) dough making and it works perfectly. My wife prepared dough for cake as well and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Viral Dave

customer_reviews.title: No rotation of the bowl
customer_reviews.text: It is very difficult to rotate the bowl. It stays in one position. In order to get the batter mixed, one has to stop the mixer, and use a spatula to mix it up. I have been baking and using mixers for many years. This is the first one I have disliked!That is why I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Judith

customer_reviews.title: Great little mixer!
customer_reviews.text: This mixer is perfect for my needs, however, if you do a LOT of baking, especially in big batches, you may want to consider one of Cuisinart's larger models, as this suggests not more than 4 1/2 cups of flour. Other than that, for me it is a great mixer; easy to handle and clean up, and ever bit as good as a Kitchen Aid!
customer_reviews.author: John Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is our first stand mixer. We do a lot of dessert baking. Using hand mixer to make good sponge cakes and etc (15 to 20 minute mix time) was just too much work. We love this mixer. It's Quiet, Powerful, a Joy to Operate and Easy to Clean. Size is perfect for our needs. Now we prepare great cakes and frostings without having to spend long times hovering over a bowl, holding onto a hand mixer with batter flying all over the work space.
customer_reviews.author: AMZ Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and great price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mixer. It’s the perfect size for my baking. It’s very lightweight so it’s easy to carry to my baking area. I highly recommend this mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Sent back for repair under warranty. If I have no more trouble with it , I am happy with its performance in the kitchen Update : After 2 months I received a replacement and that has now also failed. I am not going to send it back this time
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy R. Worthington M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Scrape often, powerful-May trip GFI outlet.
customer_reviews.text: This mixer is so quiet compared to my hand mixer. It mixes my thick cookie dough without overheating. The bowl locks into place which means it does not rotate-you have to detach to periodically scrape the sides. The splatter cover is okay, but dry ingredients cannot be added easily without spilling (unless you used a funnel). Overall, it’s nice. The red is pretty. It is not too heavy to lift. CON: It tripped my GFI breakers in the kitchen (I’m in an older apartment) and can only be used at ONE outlet where the fridge plugs in.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra H

customer_reviews.title: Bad paddle design
customer_reviews.text: love this except for one thing: horrible at creaming butter and sugar because the paddle doesn't reach the side of the bowl. You end up with 1/8 inch of butter sugar paste covering the bowl with no air incorporated for fluffiness. Really surprised: cuisinart is usually top of the line, but they need a better attachment. Back to a hand mixer for me. Edit: you can use the wisk to cream butter and sugar if your butter is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: LAT

customer_reviews.title: Nice little mixer!
customer_reviews.text: A must for a whole food plant based kitchen. I virtually use this mixer on a daily basis. Quick clean up, lightweight (not a monster like my kitchen aid) as works very well. Maybe a little louder thank Kitchen Aid, but i love the size and convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Nutragirl

customer_reviews.title: Amazin
customer_reviews.text: Right away I knew I made a great purchase. Easy ro use amd clean. Mades easy work of making bread, cookies ans cakes. Have not made pasta yet, ha a plentt of power ans bwry quite.
customer_reviews.author: Raleigh Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Stand Mixer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little stand mixer for the money. I only bake a few times a year, so I didn't want to spend hundreds of dollars for a stand mixer. It works very well for normal size batches. The only negative is that it doesn't scrape the sides very well and you have to stop it once in a while and use a spatula on the sides to make sure everything gets mixed throughly. Other than that it is a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mixer met all my expectations
customer_reviews.text: All the reviews I read online were spot on and helped me make the decision to buy this model. It is lightweight to lift but stays on the counter without moving while mixing. It is so quiet you can actually talk to someone while it is running. Mixes great - would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cape Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great value-works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: My avocado green hand mixer started to show signs of wear!! I decided to treat myself to a stand mixer. This mixer is solid, works like a charm and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Mixer
customer_reviews.text: A study, reasonably price mixer. It is very versatile. My wife likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald G. Sprovero

customer_reviews.title: Works Okay.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is designed to do and I've not had any problems with it; however, I would like it if the attachments mixed the ingredients a little closer to the bottom of the bowl. Be sure to use a spatula and check the bottom of the bowl before pouring contents out of mixing bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 10 year old who is very enthusiastic about baking, and she is using it like a pro. Only thing we'd love is a clear glass bowl in place of the steel bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Md Nazmul Ahsan

customer_reviews.title: The right size
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and power of this mixer just what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality. Great..
customer_reviews.text: Very good buy just right size3.5 qt nicer than kitchen Aid.
customer_reviews.author: Dick pleier

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use.  I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to use. Especially when mixing meatloaf.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Williams

customer_reviews.title: It’s the perfect size!!! Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s the perfect size for a 2-3 people family!!! It’s so easy to use and easy to clean!!! Good quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dillon Peng

customer_reviews.title: Excelent
customer_reviews.text: Excelent!!! It is not loud and it worked well for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It’s sturdy and easy to use. Looks and feels just like a Kitchen Aide. Excellent value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: M. Szostek

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Got it for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Love it and got a red one. I have the smaller one which takes less valuable counter space.
customer_reviews.author: mec59

customer_reviews.title: Good product & value
customer_reviews.text: Reviews indicated that the Cuisinart mixer was less expensive and just as well-engineered as the Kitchen Aid. So far, my experience is consistent with those reviews. The Cuisinart mixer doesn't come in all of the pretty colors that Kitchen Aid mixers do, but if performance is what matters most, then saving a hundred bucks is a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: E. Fields

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this mini!
customer_reviews.text: The regular stand mixers take up a lot of counter space. I wanted a mini and almost pulled the trigger on a Kitchen Aide. Then I saw the Cuisinart ! It's light, a fabulous RED, comes with 3 attachments, a splash guard, better motor than the Kitchen Aide AND a 3yr warranty ! What was NOT to love? It does everything I need it to do!
customer_reviews.author: Yieldcurve

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Mixer
customer_reviews.text: I was torn between Kitchenaid and Cuisinart and chose Cuisinart based on the many reviews of both despite the fact that I grew up with Kitchenaid. I am very happy with the Cuisinart. I believe the Cuisinart performance specifications and the overall design are better than the Kitchenaid. I have no problem inserting and removing the whisk, paddle, hook, etc. as others have reported. The specifications and performance information were not readily available for the Kitchenaid even after contacting Customer Service. In fact, I felt like I was given the run around by the Customer Service person when I asked certain pointed questions. Cuisinart, on the other hand, had all of this information up front and available on their website.
customer_reviews.author: Nepenthe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mixer for small spaces and small families.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for smaller batches of items to mix. It's compact and fits neatly under the sink in my small cottage. The red it's gorgeous. You won't be mixing heavy dough or large batches of bread or cookies. I had a large heavy duty mixer, and it was too much machine for me.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first stand mixer, I've had it a few months and use it weekly. I've mixed everything from bread to whipped cream in it with good results. It's sturdy and well made. Love the color!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for average recipes and small family baking (ie frosting, cake, softening cream cheese, blending butter, muffin batter, dips, pb cookies, etc). Small enough to stay on the counter without taking up room. Mixing bowl and mixer tools go right into the dishwasher. This is our 1st stand mixer and it's great.
customer_reviews.author: E Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Handy little mixer!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this mixer!! Short enough that it fits under my cupboards yet large enough bowl that I can mix up a double batch of cinnamon rolls!!
customer_reviews.author: walkerkid

customer_reviews.title: Great little stand mixer
customer_reviews.text: What an absolutely perfect little stand mixer. I don't use one often enough to put out $300 + on a KitchenAid... but this one, at this price is perfect. Incredibly easy to use. if you are looking to make large batches of things all at once you will want to find one with a bigger bowl but for me this size is just perfect
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Compact efficient and a value
customer_reviews.text: Great value and good size for regular folk who don't make 500 pounds of dough at a time. Also runs very quietly!
customer_reviews.author: Robert C Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Mixer
customer_reviews.text: I love my mixer, got the 31/2 qt because the 5.5 I thought were just to heavy as I don’t leave my beater on the counter this size is very manageable for me . Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH RENZULLI

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: I love my new stand mixer. Making bread is a breeze now. I am glad I decided to buy with cuisinart because their products are well built and last a long time. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: ranger one

customer_reviews.title: Nice little mixer
customer_reviews.text: Easy lifting. Nice speed, smooth running. Easy to clean. I would give it five stars but I found that contents collects on the side of the bowl, requiring stops to scrape. Otherwise, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Nordmeyer

customer_reviews.title: A little on the small size
customer_reviews.text: If I would have seen it in person, I would have purchased the next size larger. It works well and it is compact.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughters birthday and she loves it! She said it is easy to use and clean!
customer_reviews.author: CJT

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife for Christmas and she’s very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: I have a bad shoulder and this was a godsend
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don’t like is that it is hard to scrape the sides while it’s going
customer_reviews.author: dazzling duchess

customer_reviews.title: Great little mixer, quality item, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mixer! I don’t have a lot of room in my kitchen for more appliances, but this mixer fits in nicely. It seems to be of great quality, works well, washes easily, and is a good value for the price. So far I have baked cookies and made a banana bread with it and I really like the ease of use. If you don’t need a large KitchenAid mixer this is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rubin

customer_reviews.title: Durable donc Dick interior but awful exterior
customer_reviews.text: After a year of Moderate to Heavy use the nonstick interior seems to be holding up just fine however the outside is impossible for me to clean. No matter what I do or what I use on it the bottom is covered in stains. I know it may seem petty but as someone who hangs up my cookware it looks on the outside bottom and side like a hunk of junk. About to replace it with one from oxo.
customer_reviews.author: Camry Man

product_meta.title: Cuisinart SM-35 Precision Master 3.5 Quart stand mixer, White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteCuisinart continues to change the way the world mixes! Just the right size for most mixing tasks, with 12 speeds for superior control, all the accessories needed for virtually any mixing task, and optional attachments for purchase to do even more!
feature_bullets: Powerful 350-watt motor is made of Die-cast metal construction with 3. 5-quart stainless steel mixing bowl with handle
Unit has tilt-back head that allows easy access to mixing bowl, 12 speeds for precision mixing and a power outlet for use with optional attachments
Includes: chef’s whisk, flat mixing paddle, dough hook, and splash guard with pour spout, instruction manual and recipe book
Compatible with Cuisinart accessories: Pasta Extruder (PE-50), Pasta Roller & Cutter Set (PRS-50), Meat Grinder (MG-50), Spiralizer/Slicer/Shredder (SPI-50)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars117 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
